children.docstring: * [#59](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/59): Wrong usage of `stream_isatty()`, `fstat()` used without checking whether the fun
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#63](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/63): `Runtime::getCurrentSettings()` does not correctly process INI settings
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Changed PHP version constraint in `composer.json` from `^7.3 || ^8.0` to `>=7.3`
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * This component is now supported on PHP 8
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * Tests etc. are now ignored for archive exports
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * `Runtime::performsJustInTimeCompilation()` returns `true` if PHP 8's JIT is active, `false` otherwise
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * [#55](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/55): `stty` command is executed even if no tty is available
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * `Runtime::getNameWithVersionAndCodeCoverageDriver()` now prioritizes PCOV over Xdebug when both extensions are loaded (just like php-code-coverage d
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * This component is no longer supported on PHP 7.1 and PHP 7.2
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: * [#50](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/50): Windows improvements to console capabilities
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * [#49](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/49): Detection how OpCache handles docblocks does not work correctly when PHPDBG is us
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#44](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/44): `TypeError` in `Console::getNumberOfColumnsInteractive()`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Fixed an issue in `Runtime::getCurrentSettings()`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#36](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/36): `Runtime::getCurrentSettings()`
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * Implemented `Runtime::getNameWithVersionAndCodeCoverageDriver()` method * [#34](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/34): Support f
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * [#33](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/33): `Runtime::discardsComments()` returns true too eagerly
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Removed support for Zend Optimizer+ in `Runtime::discardsComments()`
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: * [#31](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/31): Regressions in `Console` class
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#25](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/25): `Console::hasColorSupport()` does not work on Windows
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * This component is no longer supported on PHP 7.0
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: * [#21](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/21): Equivalent of `PHP_OS_FAMILY` (for PHP < 7.2)
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * [#20](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/pull/20): PHP 7 mode of HHVM not forced
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#18](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/18): `Uncaught TypeError: preg_match() expects parameter 2 to be string, null given`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#17](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/environment/issues/17): `Uncaught TypeError: trim() expects parameter 1 to be string, boolean given`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Fixed inverted logic in `Runtime::discardsComments()`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Implemented `Runtime::discardsComments()` for querying whether the PHP runtime discards annotations
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * This component is no longer supported on PHP 5.6
children.name: Removed

symbols.name: Installation
